scenes.background: Monica nods in agreement while Bob still looks uncertain.
scenes.description: I think we should all learn from this. What do you think?

options.text: Absolutely, Monica. There's always room for improvement.
options.analysis: You agree with Monicaâ€™s suggestion, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but could improve on perception and empathy.

options.text: Perhaps, but it felt necessary to step in this time.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the possibility of learning but justify your action, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy could be stronger.

options.text: I agree, but sometimes decisions have to be made quickly.
options.analysis: You agree with Monica but emphasize the necessity of quick decisions, demonstrating empathy but lower in perception and motivation.
